p: Table 2 shows that 88% of respondents have resided in Chilonga for over 25 years; this implies knowledge of the climatic conditions. Of the respondents, 93% indicated that they were not willing to relocate; they were born in Chilonga and learned to cope with climatic changes. A total of 7% indicated that they would want to migrate to urban areas or diaspora so as to give back remittances.
